Card Description:
Sorting filter does not reset when returning to inventory`

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Go to inventory page
2. Change sorting to "Price (low to high)"
3. Click a product to view its details
4. Click back to return to inventory

Expected Result:
Sorting should reset to default ("Name: A to Z")

Actual Result:
Sorting still shows "Price (low to high)"

Severity:  Low
Status: To Review

![b2.PNG](https://trello.com/1/cards/688f3e79f81bf0ac68b651f7/attachments/688f3f056a702ff2ea55b83c/download/b2.PNG)
